name: Italian Pizza
description: Homemade thin crust, sprankled with tomato sauce with our special italian recipe, that includes oregano and olives.

name: Classic Meatballs
description: Delicious juicy meatballs prepared in the way of middle age - like Romans were eating. Comes with a side of potatoes.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Nice juicy spaghetti filled with creamy carbonara sauce that contains sweet cream and mushrooms.
